pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dynamic Panel Models with Orthogonal Reparameterization of Fixed Effects // Implements the orthogonal reparameterization approach recommended by Lancaster (2002) to estimate dynamic panel models with fixed effects (and optionally: panel specific intercepts). The approach uses a likelihood-based estimator and produces estimates that are asymptotically unbiased as N goes to infinity, with a T as low as 2.
